Label: Positif

Ulasan: Several years ago when i first visited this place, it was nice, everything is made by nature, but today i saw huge improvements that makes it even better. There is even a cafe! Well done, Sampang!

Ulasan: Best mini waterfall ! Although need 3 to 4 hours to get there from surabaya. But its worth it, got a nice sunset view and fresh water from the waterfall, the waterfall itself falldown through to sea and have an clear view of water. Nice one !
Label: Positif

Ulasan: Such a peaceful and beautiful place! The best time to go here is sunset(which unfirtunately, I can not see the sunset there because I went there in the rainy season). But taking picture here in blue hour is also great. I spent a night here …

Ulasan: Toroan waterfalls is a tourist destination in Sampang. It's located near of Ketapang traditional market. This waterfalls close to the beach so that the water will flow to the sea. This place is not recommended for children because there is not sufficient area for playing and prohibited to swim here.
Label: Positif

Ulasan: Unique waterfall. The water fall directly in to the sea/beach. This is the biggest waterfall in Madura. We must be very carefull when walking around the beach near the waterfall. Dont ever swim under the waterfall.
Label: Positif

Ulasan: Although a distance from Surabaya to here is god damn so far, around 100 kilometers, but believe me that worth it at all! The waterfall drop directly into the sea, very unique. But remember, you can't swim in there because there is a hole below the waterfall.
Label: Positif

Ulasan: It is an adorable place, which is a great spot for relax and take a picture. The access is easy. But the road from Bangkalan to this area is not in a good condition. We must drive carefully. But still, must go place once before you die !
Label: Positif

Ulasan: Man made waterfalls, it’s a diverted overflow from a nearby river to the sea. Ingenious though. Need to walk down 50 steps stair. There’s a small area where people can enjoy the “waterfall”
Label: Positif

Ulasan: small waterfall, but has an easy access, near the public road. the panorama at sunset is very beautiful. you can go down below the waterfall to take some pictures, but be careful because there are many rocks around there. still it's one of several popular waterfall in Madura Island. it's recommended place to visit when you're in Madura.
Label: Positif
